p:
The temperature response curve for aggregation of
O. asellus
(Fig. 3c, d) has a higher peak aggregation index of 3.35 at a higher temperature of 21.3 째C, a wide performance breadth of 6.2 째C at 90% of the peak value and a gradient for its thermal norm of reaction between 14 -17 째C of 1.5 in the aggregation index over this 3 째C range. This was approximately twice as steep as for
P. scaber
and three times as steep as for
A. vulgare
. The decline following the peak for
O. asellus
was less pronounced than for either of the other two species.
